name: The Escapists 2 - Season Pass
detailed_description:
Get access to exciting additional content for The Escapists 2 with the season pass. Test your escaping expertise by breaking out of three exhilarating new prisons with extra items, customisations and thrilling new ways to escape!

The Escapists 2 Season Pass will feature 3 brand new prisons to be released over the coming months, this Season Pass will represent a saving over purchasing the prisons individually.

Note: The Glorious Regime prison is NOT included in the Season Pass.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (32-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 6600 @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
